name: Progressing
description:
A game made for Newbies Game Jam (2022-2) with the theme: Death = Progress.

In order to fill up the progress, you will have to die. (by hitting the spikes)

Controls:

Move - Left/Right arrows

Jump - Space/Shift

Known issue: Sometimes the game doesn't play any sound when you hit spikes.

(P/s: This is my first game so it doesn't have any menu, because I don't know how to make it lol)
